name: B|Braun Infusomat Space Simulator [ALPHA]
description:
Hello, I'm the Developer of this simulator. 

These simulator are created with PowerPoint Animation Script.   For now. Before think that is bad, please view first!   That have much things! But need to wait!

Send ideas in comments to add.
